title: Mambo Time - Chocolate Edition
description:
On Saturday, 30 October 2021, from 21:00 to 02:00, the sixth edition of Mambo Time - the Chocolate Edition - will take place at the Hotel Restaurant Landhus.
We are dedicating this event especially to our Chocolate Mambo Marathon, which we have now had to postpone twice.

DJ Morena (Ljubljana) and DJ Patrick el Clásico (Geneva) are both DJs who are also involved in the marathon. So there will be a little foretaste of the marathon ambience in June.
 
Samuel and Lisa from Freiburg will give us another great show. They are also on a workshop tour in Zurich this weekend.
 
 
On the Friday before the event, there will also be a coordinated mambo event in Wohlen (SalsaOlé).
 
For dancers who need to be tested for a Covid certificate, only one test is necessary for both events (certificate must be valid on both dates).

 
Pure social dancing to the best old school Salsa, Cha-Cha-Cha and Boogaloo in a classy ambience.

Admission: CHF 26.-
Tickets: https://eventfrog.ch/de/p/party/latin-brasil/mambo-time-chocolate-edition-6850490217703912626.html

At the Hotel Restaurant Landhus, Katzenbachstrasse 10, Zurich Seebach (terminus Tram 14)

http://salsaon2.ch
